detaileddescription.para: Number of image slots in flash; currently limited to two.
Maximum number of image sectors supported by the bootloader.
Compatibility shim for flash sector type.
This can be deleted when flash_area_to_sectors() is removed.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *hash, uint32_t hlen, uint8_t *sig, int slen, uint8_t key_id)
memberdef.name: bootutil_verify_sig

detaileddescription.para: Reads the image trailer from the scratch area.
Writes the supplied boot status to the flash file system. The boot status contains the current state of an in-progress image copy operation.
